name: The Cavern (itch)
description:
Conceived as an end-of-year project for Aula Arcade, The Cavern is a prototype game based on the misadventure of Emp, a defenseless boy who is locked in a cavern.Yhis is  a 3D game with a 2D perspective where platforms and puzzles prevail. You must advance and find the exit thanks to the torch that our protagonist carries. The cavern is home to secrets and hiding places, all of them combined by an absolute darkness that you must overcome thanks to your fragile light. Fire is the key, it opens the way for you and reveals secrets. So you already know. Keep on fire.

Controls:

A, D: Move to the sides

Left Click: Interaction

Hold Left Click: Reveal

Space: Jump

Escape: Return to Main Menu
